weights.title: Weights
weights.description: Weights for each condition. Length must match conditions array

method.title: Method
method.description: Method by which to order trials

retry_method.title: Retry Method
retry_method.description: If not null, use this method to retry trials that were not completed correctly

length.title: Block Length
length.description: Number of trials in the block (not including retried trials)

max_retries.title: Max Retries
max_retries.description: Maximum number of times to retry a trial that was not completed correctly. Unlimited if null.
